posts.post_content:
Hello,

I'm not sure what happened, but it's been difficult to find T3s recently.  A year or two ago they were prolific in every auction, but have recently become scarce.  Here are a few that I hope someone will want.  Priced to sell.  Prices include insured shipping.  Please send me a PM or email if interested and thank you!

Check, M/O or Paypal gift appreciated.  Thanks.

IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A SPECIFIC T3, PLEASE LET ME KNOW.

18.  Jennings (HOFer)  PSA-1.5  $250
23.  Lajoie (HOFer) SOLD, THX!
26.  McGraw (HOFer)  PSA-2  $285
30.  Mullin  PSA-4.5  $500
31.  Magee PSA-4(MK)  $225
88.  Coveleski   PSA-2.5 $225
103. Konetchy  PSA-3  $255
103. Konetchy  PSA-4  $375

82.  Bransfield (raw) PSA says "Too big" SGC-40?  $300
89.  Criger (raw) slim, o/w looks like PSA-5+  ad-back  SOLD, THX!
94.  Gibson (raw) PSA says "Too big"  SGC-60?  $545

T9  58. McFarland  PSA-3  $175
T9  66. Brown  PSA-4(MK) $180

Happy Collecting,
Craig
I attached a scan of the Lajoie.  Such a beautiful card, never get tired of looking at it.
